entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is mentioned as a person who receives a letter addressed to him.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle and guardian. He is mentioned as a person who visits Harry in his cupboard.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin. He is mentioned as the owner of a second bedroom that Harry might move into.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon visited Harry in his cupboard.
Harry might move into Dudley's second bedroom.
